name: Aroostook Technologies
tag_list: two-way-radio, wireless, internet, motorola, kenwood, icon, vortex, canopy, cctv, tower-climbers, security, phones, computer-repair
overview:
Aroostook Technologies, Inc. is a locally owned business located in Presque Isle, Maine that has been servicing the needs of our customers for more than 50 years. Originally started as a two-way radio service shop, the business has grown steadily over the years and now offers a host of products and services that include wireless internet, computer sales and service, security and CCTV systems, communication tower installation and maintenance and much more.

Providing public safety, industrial, commercial and individual customers with the products and services that they need to be more efficient and to operate in a safer environment is our specialty.

In todayâ€™s fast paced world, the demand for information, security and communications is higher than ever. Technology is constantly changing and the needs of the end user are always evolving. We make it our business to help you with your business by staying up to date with the latest advances in technology. From state of the art communications equipment to computers and networking for your home and business, Aroostook Technologies, Inc. is the best source for all of your technology needs
